title: this is why u never quit aram no matter how bad it looks lvl5 when all those poke champions are od
body:
had a aram game 5 mins ago. my b4 ass hot atarina that i never play, and we was getting poked by lux,karma,diana,vli,and soe ther irrelvant i forgot. they were still beating us when they got to the inhib.yi ragequit way before that, not being able to deal with the rpeated poke deaths.soon late game, and i put my carry pasnts on and rekt all the squshy pokers who deared come near me, and eing away fromv oli after ma reset.lesson of the story never ff or quit aram
http://www.replay.gg/search/na/omegaarab#2253866512
also,i leanred from a board a few days ago tat u only needed one or more mr items not to get oenshot by ap champs and be usefull who woulda tought

also for those of u say ur bronze so ur opinion is worthless fuck u  ive been playing for 2 years with massive breaks in between so i never realy improve, but ull find about 5 out of every 6 games with  my main is 16-20/3 kda
